tagline: Wordpress plugin to visualize recent visits from media companies with MediaCreeper
body:
# Visualize recent visits from media companies with MediaCreeper

## Description

MediaCreeper tracks visitors from media companies using the API available
from MediaCreeper.com. Visits are visualized inside the admin area with
a graph in the Dashboard Widget. Each post gets its own metabox in the
editor with information about recent visits by media companies to that post.

See [MediaCreeper.com](http://mediacreeper.com) and [MediaCreeper.com API](http://api.mediacreeper.com) for more details.

## Download
Download [mediacreeper.1.0.zip](https://github.com/mediacreeper/mediacreeper/blob/gh-pages/mediacreeper.1.0.zip?raw=true) now.

## Installation

1. Upload the `mediacreeper` directory to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress

## Screenshots

![Daily visitors visualized as a pie graph in a Dashboard Widget](https://raw.github.com/mediacreeper/mediacreeper/master/screenshot-1.jpg)

![Recent visits listed in a metabox inside the editor](https://raw.github.com/mediacreeper/mediacreeper/master/screenshot-2.jpg)

![Settings panel](https://raw.github.com/mediacreeper/mediacreeper/master/screenshot-3.jpg)
name: Mediacreeper
